name: vending_machine_api
description: An API for a vending machine, allowing users with a “seller” role to add, update or remove products, while users with a “buyer” role can deposit coins into the machine and make purchases.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cp -r build ../backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run deploy
scripts.buildrender:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../frontend && npm run build && cp -r buid ../backend
scripts.deployrender:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push

author: Queendalin O. Ezenwa
